timeline.bodyText: The declaration of vw could be moved to line 645 since it is only used to compute the ar value there.
timeline.author: thornbill
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -639,7 +639,6 @@ private void changeSurfaceLayout(int videoWidth, int videoHeight, int videoVisib
         double ar, vw;

replies.bodyText:
Fixed, I've also removed some more junk code from this file.
Some properties were set but never read, other were read but never set.
replies.author: nielsvanvelzen

timeline.message: Remove even more unused code from VideoManager

timeline.bodyText: For this check; mCurrentBuffer was never set so this if-statement would never execute the return.
